titles.title: HEARD Act of 2019
HEARD Act of 2019
Helping Entrepreneurs Affects Regulatory Decisions Act of 2019
A bill to allow remote participation on review panels under the Regulatory Flexibility Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Helping Entrepreneurs Affects Regulatory Decisions Act of 2019 or the HEARD Act of 2019
This bill permits agencies to convene required review panels through electronic participation when conducting the initial regulatory flexibility analysis of a proposed rule. It also requires agencies to facilitate the electronic participation of small businesses in such panels.
